articles.title: The 10-minute challenge: Quick-commerce becomes the villain for neighbourhood kirana stores
articles.description: Quick commerce companies now make up 40-50% of all e-commerce sales of FMCG firms and they pose an existential threat to both neighbourhood kirana stores as well as big e-comm players. Here’s what makes them tick.
articles.content: Naresh Singh Shekhawat runs a grocery store NMart in one of the upscale condominiums of Gurgaon. He hadrelocated from his home state of Rajasthan to the National Capital Region (NCR) in search of a f… [+6893 chars]
